Event: I miss Vermont

But let's try to focus on the positive aspects of your current situation. Maybe this is an opportunity for you to explore new places and experiences, and who knows, you might even discover a new favorite spot! And hey, technology is amazing, right? We can still stay in touch and share our experiences with each other, no matter where we are in the world. 😊 Sending you lots of love and positive vibes!"
